item.author: Jeremy Lipp
item.title: Process Application Development
item.description: This training module will cover BPMN2 (Business Process Management Notation) process mapping, data management and scripting capabilities, mapping actors and roles, applying filters, creating new filters, connect to external systems (databases, email, document management, Rules, others), custom connectors creation, end user interfaces (complete customization of forms in a Web application) and, a complete end-to-end process development
